error.details.page.invalid.content: The value of the URL parameter `page` must be a positive integer.

error.details.page.out_of_bounds.content: The value of the URL parameter `page` must not exceed ${pageCount}, the page count.

error.details.per-page.invalid.content: The value of the URL parameter `per-page` must be a positive integer.

error.details.sort.conflict.content: The URL parameters `sort-asc` and `sort-desc` cannot be specified simultaneously.

error.details.sort.unknown.content: The value of the URL parameter `${paramName}` is not a known sorting column.
